name: Paranormal Snacktivity
description:
One Raccoon's quest for a quiet life... and some snacks. Made for Spooky 2D Jam 2022 by Theo (Gameplay/Design/Code) & Chloe (Art, Music).

~ Find a way to scare the teens away from the abandoned house and steal their snacks - as quickly as possible!

~ Don't touch the torch light or you'll get thrown out!

~ Press SPACE to interact with sparkly objects to help complete your mission.

~ Use WASD or ARROW KEYS to move and jump

~ Press W or UP twice to double jump

~ Hold Z to zoom out and see the whole house
